attributes.action: erect images of HM Queen Elizabeth II at all arrival ports & terminals across the United Kingdom. Let’s show over sea foreigners how proud we are to be British.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We propose for the Prime Minister to ensure images of HM Queen Elizabeth II are allocated at all arrival ports & terminals across the United Kingdom. Let’s show over sea foreigners how proud we are to be British. 

Thailand has pictures of their King everywhere, why not show HM the respect she needs in her own country.

God Save The Queen
